1.0.name: wordpress/broken-rss-feed-fixer
1.0.description: Broken Rss Feed Fixer is designed to fix broken rss feeds caused by forcing ads or any other type of extra unwanted elements added into your rss feed, Broken Rss Feed Fixer will frequently update a new rss feed file called 'rss.xml' you can use this file as your new rss feed file for feedburner or any thing else.
